summary_md: Hungary's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP (16,525 USD per person) and a moderate inflation rate (3.70%). The unemployment rate (4.43%) and life expectancy (76.77 years) provide insights into the labor market and health environment. The country has a significant internet user base (91.50%), contributing to its digital landscape. Overall, Hungary presents a balanced economic and social environment.

sections.economy_md: Hungary's economy is reflected by its per capita GDP (16,525 USD per person) and a moderate inflation rate (3.70%).
sections.labor_md: The labor market is indicated by an unemployment rate (4.43%) and a life expectancy (76.77 years), suggesting stability and a healthy workforce.
sections.digital_md: With a substantial portion of the population as internet users (91.50%), Hungary is actively engaged in the digital economy.
sections.health_env_md: The health environment in Hungary is supported by a life expectancy (76.77 years), indicating a relatively high standard of living.
